Title.evidence: A Randomised Controlled Trial on Extracellular Vesicles in PRBC Transfusion

Trial_Design.evidence: prospective subanalysis of a recent observational feasibility study

Participants.evidence: 23 postoperative ICU patients: 5 after open aortic surgery, 9 after bilateral lung transplantation, and 9 after other surgeries. Eligibility criteria were age 18-99 years and PRBC transfusion postoperatively.

Method_Outcome.evidence: EVs were analyzed using flow cytometry.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Total EVs, EryEVs, total PEVs, and GEVs increased post-transfusion compared to baseline in the entire cohort.
